bibl.idno: The Papers of Henry Rose Carter [manuscript] ; HEALTHSCI MS-10.

bibl.title: Letter from L. O. Howard to Laura Armistead Carter, November 20, 1928

div1.p: Howard is happy to help Carter and encourages her to consult him for further assistance.

div1.head: Letter from L. O. Howard to Laura Armistead Carter, November 20, 1928
div1.opener:
Book Bibliography.
Howard, L. O.
UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF AGRICULTURE
BUREAU OF ENTOMOLOGY
WASHINGTON, D. C.
November 20, 1928.
Miss Laura A. Carter,
The Westmoreland,
2122 California Street, N. W.,
Washington, D. C.
Dear Miss Carter:
div1.p:
I am very glad to have your note of the 18th. It is a great
pleasure to have been of assistance to you. Please do not hesitate for
a moment to consult me when you think I can be of any help to you.
div1.closer:
Sincerely yours, L. O. Howard Principal Entomologist
loh-wft
